mapper.select: select count(*) from portFolio where memberID = #{memberID}
select memberID, portfolioNum, portfolioName from portFolio where memberID = #{memberID} order by portfolioNum ASC
mapper.insert: insert into portFolio (portfolioNum, memberID, portfolioName) values ((select nvl(max(portfolioNum),0)+1 from portFolio), #{memberID}, #{portfolioName})
